data.Title: Google Rolls Out August 2024 Core Update
data.Description: Google has started rolling out its August 2024 core update. Early observations suggest potential recoveries for sites negatively impacted by the September Helpful Content Update, along with a significant ranking bug.

data.Title: Google Search Ranking Bug Impacts Results
data.Description: This morning at 1:48 am ET, Google confirmed a Google Search ranking bug impacting a large number of the Google Search results. Google wrote, "There's an ongoing issue with ranking in Google Search that's affecting a large number of search results. We've identified the root cause and this issue is unrelated to the ongoing core update rollout."

data.Title: FTC Bans Fake Reviews
data.Description: The Federal Trade Commission (FTC) has officially banned fake and AI-generated reviews and testimonials. Violators could face fines of up to $50,000 per violation.

data.Title: Google AI Overviews Expand Globally
data.Description: Google is updating its AI-generated search summaries to improve the display of sources and simplify overly complex summaries.

data.Title: Native Advertising in 2024: Leveraging Google's SEO Changes
data.Description: In early 2024, Google updated its SEO strategy, focusing more on content quality. These changes prioritize content that aligns with user intent and improves the user experience.
